movie.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movie.actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing
movie.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
movie.awards: Won 6 Oscars. Another 50 wins and 28 nominations.

movie.title: Star Trek
movie.writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, Gene Roddenberry (television series "Star Trek")
movie.actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana
movie.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
movie.awards: Won 1 Oscar. Another 23 wins and 89 nominations.

movie.title: Mad Max
movie.actors: Mel Gibson, Joanne Samuel, Hugh Keays-Byrne, Steve Bisley
movie.plot: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

movie.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movie.writer: Stefan Zweig (inspired by the writings of), Wes Anderson (screenplay), Wes Anderson (story), Hugo Guinness (story)
movie.actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
movie.plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.
movie.awards: Won 4 Oscars. Another 127 wins and 217 nominations.

movie.title: Oblivion
movie.writer: Karl Gajdusek (screenplay), Michael Arndt (screenplay), Joseph Kosinski (graphic novel original story)
movie.actors: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Olga Kurylenko, Andrea Riseborough
movie.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
